post.author: Ihn-Sok
post.content:
We currently have a need for several Distributed Analysts/Developers for a long-term engagement with one of our clients.  

Role:
Working as a member of the M team that will be responsible for analysis, design, estimating, development, testing, documentation and implementation management of a multi-year initiative.

Skills:
•        Excellent analysis and development skills (at least 3 years) using Java, J2EE, Object Oriented, and related technologies.
•        Strong experience with JCL, DB2, IMS/DC, TSO, MVS.
•        Experience with use cases.
•        Good understanding of Rational Rose / UML.
•        Good understanding of performance tuning.
•        Able to create detailed design documents, technical specifications.
•        Experience with SDLC (System Development Life Cycle) or RUP (Rational Unified Process).
•        Financial Institution experience is an asset.
•        Solid written and verbal communication skills.

Please forward resume or call me
thomaslee101@gmail.com or 647-271-4311
post.title: Many Java Developers
